snippet: “Get Smart” was ahead of its time. The world today is cleaving into “Control” and “Kaos.”
abstract: Thomas L Friedman Op-Ed column submits absence of Cold War alliance system has left some weak states crumbling under economic, societal and environmental pressures; holds combined pressures of weak global market, extreme weather patterns and exploding use of Internet empowering small ideologically-driven groups, like Islamic State in Iraq and Syria, are all combining to create geopolitical equivalent of climate change.
lead_paragraph: “Get Smart” was ahead of its time. The world today is cleaving into “Control” and “Kaos.”
